name: Biniax 2.0
overview: Nanako’s hometown, the city of Ibh, was surrounded by four powerful countries (Land of Canutoz, Realms of Tuberya, Desert of Kekhalo and Hills of Pasokhulo), whose queens were continuously fighting for its control. The situation was overwhelming, so Nanako decided she had to do something! She asked the Oracle again, and he told Nanako that there was an ancient game called Biniax, which had been used by their ancestors to decide upon conficts involving land posession without bloodshed. The game, created by the Gods, had to be celebrated by kings and queens if any of the contenders asked for it, and the result of it had to me obbeyed. The game was played on a board, in which the contender had to remove a certain number of blocks following simple rules.
